header.title: Get Involved With Us
header.description: Join our mission to transform lives through technology education. There are many ways you can make a difference.

getInvolvedSection.title: Ways To Get Involved
getInvolvedSection.description: Every contribution matters. Find the perfect way to make an impact based on your skills, resources, and passion.

opportunities.title: Become a Volunteer
opportunities.description: Volunteer with us in various roles - from mentoring student. Find your perfect fit.

achievements.text: Support career development and job placement

opportunities.title: Partner With Us
opportunities.description: Collaborate with us to create meaningful opportunities for our graduates.

achievements.text: Host networking events and career fairs
Access top tier tech and skilled techies
Build your company's talent brand with us in Africa

opportunities.title: Become A Sponsor
opportunities.description: Your sponsorship directly transforms lives by removing financial barriers to quality tech education.

achievements.text: Sponsor essential equipment and learning resources
Create named scholarships or program initiatives
Receive detailed impact reports and recognition

ctaBanner.title: Everyone Deserves The Chance To Learn Tech
ctaBanner.description: Leading digital agency with solid design and development expertise. We build readymade websites, mobile applications, and elaborate online business services.
